metadata.header_path: /FORM 10-K/Part I/Item 1A - Risk Factors/Business and Industry Risks/
aws::graph::propositions: Uncertainties in PRC and Indian Legal Interpretations
There are substantial uncertainties regarding the interpretation of People's Republic of China (PRC) laws and regulations.
There are substantial uncertainties regarding the interpretation of Indian laws and regulations.
PRC and Indian governments may ultimately take a view contrary to Amazon's interpretation of laws and regulations.
Amazon's Chinese businesses may be unable to continue to operate if Amazon or its affiliates cannot access sufficient funding.
Amazon's Chinese businesses may be unable to continue to operate if Amazon or its affiliates cannot enforce contractual relationships in China.
Amazon's Indian businesses may be unable to continue to operate if Amazon or its affiliates cannot access sufficient funding.
Violation of existing PRC laws or regulations could result in Amazon's businesses in China being subject to fines.
Violation of future PRC laws or regulations could result in Amazon's businesses in China being subject to fines.
Violation of existing Indian laws or regulations could result in Amazon's businesses in India being subject to fines.
Violation of future Indian laws or regulations could result in Amazon's businesses in India being subject to fines.
Violation of existing or future PRC laws could result in Amazon's businesses in China being subject to other financial penalties.
Violation of existing or future Indian laws could result in Amazon's businesses in India being subject to other financial penalties.
Violation of existing or future PRC laws could result in Amazon having licenses revoked in China.
Violation of existing or future Indian laws could result in Amazon having licenses revoked in India.
Violation of existing or future PRC laws could force Amazon to restructure operations in China.
Violation of existing or future Indian laws could force Amazon to restructure operations in India.
Violation of existing or future PRC laws could force Amazon to shut down operations in China entirely.
Violation of existing or future Indian laws could force Amazon to shut down operations in India entirely.
Changes in interpretations of PRC laws could result in negative consequences for Amazon's businesses in China.
Changes in interpretations of Indian laws could result in negative consequences for Amazon's businesses in India.

metadata.header_path: /FORM 10-K/Part I/Item 1A - Risk Factors/Business and Industry Risks/
/FORM 10-K/Part I/Item 1A - Risk Factors/Business and Industry Risks/

text: There are substantial uncertainties regarding the interpretation of PRC and Indian laws and regulations, and it is possible that these governments will ultimately take a view contrary to ours. In addition, our Chinese and Indian businesses and operations may be unable to continue to operate if we or our affiliates are unable to access sufficient funding or, in China, enforce contractual relationships we or our affiliates have in place. Violation of any existing or future PRC, Indian, or other laws or regulations or changes in the interpretations of those laws and regulations could result in our businesses in those countries being subject to fines and other financial penalties, having licenses revoked, or being forced to restructure our operations or shut down entirely.
